mapper.insert: insert into vehicle (veh_id, veh_type, veh_address, rou_id, veh_birth, veh_purchase_date, veh_remarks) values (#{vehId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rouId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vehPurchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vehRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update vehicle set veh_type = #{vehType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, veh_address = #{vehAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rou_id = #{rouId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, veh_birth = #{vehBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, veh_purchase_date = #{vehPurchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, veh_remarks = #{vehRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where veh_id = #{vehId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select veh_id, veh_type, veh_address, rou_id, veh_birth, veh_purchase_date, veh_remarks from vehicle
